sqlMap.select: SELECT ORG_ID ID, OWN_ORG_ID PID, ORG_NAME TEXT, ORG_LEV FROM T01_SYS_ORG
SELECT ORG_ID ID, OWN_ORG_ID PID, ORG_NAME TEXT, ORG_LEV FROM T01_SYS_ORG where ORG_ID <> '1'

select t1.org_id orgId, t1.own_org_id ownOrgId, t1.org_name orgName, t1.org_lev orgLev, t2.org_name ownOrgName from t01_sys_org t1 left join t01_sys_org t2 on t1.own_org_id = t2.org_id where t1.org_id = #orgId#
sqlMap.update: update t01_sys_org set org_name=#orgName# where org_id = #orgId#
